## AUTHENTICATION\_METADATA\_KEY variable

The key used to store log-related via @<!-- -->loopback/metadata and reflection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
AUTHENTICATION_METADATA_KEY: MetadataAccessor<AuthenticationMetadata, MethodDecorator>
```
